item.title: Victory in Iraq!
item.description: Tell everyone Hennessy broke the story. America won the Iraq war. The insurgency is broken! Peace prevails. The terrorists are routed!Where are the headlines? A man between the ages of 18 and 30 has a better chance of being murdered in Philadelphiathan of dying in Iraq in September. The third head of al Qaeda in Iraq is dead–three in 18 months. Ascending to that throne is no promotion. Face it, folks, we won the war.
